name: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 1: Bomberman Collection
overview: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 1: Bomberman Collection, is the first in a series of six compilation titles for the Game Boy Advance that contains emulated versions of Famicom games. It was released in 2005. This collection, as the name implies, contains both Bomberman games which were released on the Famicom, namely: - Bomberman - Bomberman II
